import React, { useEffect, useState } from 'react'; import BasePage from './BasePage'; import { CheckIcon, ChartBarIcon, CpuChipIcon, ShieldCheckIcon } from '@heroicons/react/24/outline'; const PlatformPage = () => { const [isVisible, setIsVisible] = useState(false); useEffect(() => { setIsVisible(true); }, []); const features = [ { icon: ChartBarIcon, title: "Real-time Analytics", description: "Get instant insights into your website performance with live data updates and comprehensive reporting." }, { icon: CpuChipIcon, title: "AI-Powered Insights", description: "Leverage machine learning algorithms to uncover hidden patterns and predict future trends." }, { icon: ShieldCheckIcon, title: "Enterprise Security", description: "Enterprise-grade security ensures your data is protected with end-to-end encryption." } ]; const capabilities = [ "Advanced data processing algorithms", "Real-time analytics dashboard", "Custom reporting tools", "API integrations", "Machine learning models", "Scalable infrastructure" ]; return ( {/* Hero Section - Fond principal harmonisé */}

The first and most trusted AI platform for analytics

Generate near-real augmented insights and unlock granular analytics in every survey.

{/* Partners Section - Fond neutre subtil sans bordure */}

Trusted by

{['Kantar', 'Ifop', 'BVA Family', 'Latenta', 'Prodege', 'Mindline'].map((company) => (
{company}
))}
{/* Main Features Section - Fond avec gradient subtil */}

Unveil insights into hard-to-reach niches without extra fieldwork

Intelly helps you reach rare or hard-to-access segments by generating predictive respondents that match your survey structure, all from your existing data.

{features.map((feature, index) => (

{feature.title}

{feature.description}

))}
{/* Trust Section - Fond blanc avec texture */}

The holy trinity of trusted AI insights

01

Survey Integrity

Boosting only works when the questionnaire is respected. Tailor-made AI solutions for market research understand survey structure.

{capabilities.slice(0, 3).map((capability, index) => (
{capability}
))}
02

Predictive Power

The best machine learning models predict reality, not just simulate it. Trust is built when AI-generated respondents match reality.

{capabilities.slice(2, 5).map((capability, index) => (
{capability}
))}
03

Benchmark at Scale

Testing at scale separates real solutions from science projects. You can only trust AI if it performs consistently.

{capabilities.slice(3, 6).map((capability, index) => (
{capability}
))}
{/* CTA Section - Harmonisé avec gradient de marque */}

Ready to transform your analytics with AI?

Join thousands of businesses already using our platform to make data-driven decisions.

); }; export default PlatformPage;
